Outside the CF is a Huge Dragon(Megaton) stareing down Slayer and Zoe
(Yanshosh and Orchids characters)

Off to the side theres a polar bear (Ice) a Wolverine (Razor Claw) and an
unhappy wolf (Lunarpine), and scattered around MegaTON (Please do not
confuse with MegaTRON) are whatever Maximals who've come out to watch the
fight.

----- Original Message -----
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, March 30, 2001 8:36 PM
Subject: Re: IR


> Firedrill's jaw hung wide open. Megatron, but how, he had died over 300
> years ago. He thought this robot was a myth, something that Autobots used
> to scare the younger soldiers. A boogy man of sorts. He was striken with
> fear, and didn't have a clue what to do. Cliffjumper did though. He
> clenched his fists in rage, and wanted to blast the frikin screen.
> Beachcomber sensed the sudden changes of emotion though, and put a
> compforting hand on Cliffjumper, "Ease up there Jumper, we've just been
> given orders" he finished, as he escorted Cliffjumper away from the
screen.
> "Come on junior" he called, reffering to the panic striken Firedrill. He
> couldn't blame him though. The kid had never met anyone as scary,
Galvatron
> left Cybertron before he was even programmed. And with his personal
> experience he felt Megatron was worce. Cold and calculating, powerfull,
and
> merciless. Firedrill snapped out of it, and followed, keeping his eyes on
> the screen, until they left, "Uhhh, sure, sure thing comander" he said,
> shakily. He would normally have been overjoyed to finally have been
> excepted, but he couldnt shake the fear.
>
> They arrived at the door, which led them out.
>
> OOC: Could someone who is largely cruicial to what is happening outside,
> explain what my characters see please?
>
>
>
